title: Collecting data - arsenic filter and water wells

content.question: (a) Assuming there is a difference in the effectiveness of the two filters, under what conditions will a randomized block design be better for detecting the difference than a completely randomized design? (b) Identify the wells, by number, that will be included in each block. (c) Describe how to assign filters to wells to create a randomized block design.
